lines.text: Mankind, you are an ignorant race. How foolish it is to believe your kind rules the Earth. Know now that your are not alone, there are unseen worlds that exist parallel to yours. These are the worlds of the Makai, a race of demons. And the Jujinkai, those that are half-man and half-beast. There is an ancient legend, a prophecy fortelling the appearance of a super being every three thousand years. He is called the Chojin! A god above all gods, the Overfiend! The Chojin will appear through the body of a human and with his great power he will unite the three worlds. He will create a new world, a world of peace and harmony. His time has now come!
Hahaha. Now I have your sperm.
It's the end of the world!
You fucking Ma-Kai are all the same. One little sniff of pussy, and you lose it!
Nagumo, tell me it was just a bad dream. Tell me Mrs. Ogami wasn't a monster, that she didn't rape me. Oh please!
I sense the coming... of the Chojin!

[Watching the girls feel up Ozaki]
What a lucky son of a bitch, the fucking pervert!
You fucking monster, not only do I have your sperm I've got your blood too!
